content: when you buy the pdf pattern pack you get \* pdf file with this pattern written with standard crochet abbreviations \* crochet symbol diagrams for the square \* easy print pdf of this blog post https //blanketswithheart com/geometric-eye-crochet-blanket-square/ for ease of printing and working embrace the art of crochet with our geometric eye crochet square pattern this versatile design is perfect for creating stunning afghans or blankets the pattern includes written instructions making it accessible for all skill levels the unisex design features intricate surface crochet and classic square motif with a clear chart to guide you you ll enjoy the process of crafting this eye-catching square get ready to showcase your crochet skills with this unique and modern pattern **unique features-** intricate surface crochet design classic crochet square motif clear chart for easy guidance **finished size -** 12 inches **materials needed-** hook 6mm us size 10 0 yarn pacific® solids aran weight 150 yards
